original_text: And they with whom precious stones were found gave them to the treasure of the house of the Lord, by the hand of Jehiel the Gershonite.
korean_text: 보석을 가진 모든 사람은 게르손 사람 여히엘의 손에 맡겨 여호와의 성전 곳간에 드렸더라

sentences.original_text: And they with whom precious stones were found
gave them to treasure of house of the Lord
by the hand of Jehiel the Gershonite
